mapper.insert: insert into em_meter_maintain_pic (id, maintain_id, path) values (#{id}, #{maintainId}, #{path})

update em_meter_maintain_pic set status=0,update_time=sysdate where maintain_id=#{id}

select t2.id,t2.e_num meter_no,t2.e_seq,t2.e_start_time,t2.e_end_time, (select to_char((max(t3.COLLECT_TIME)/(3600*24)+TO_DATE('1970-01-01 08:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') from v_em_data t3 where t3.METER_NO=t22.meter_no) last_send_time ,2 level1,t2.create_time,t2.time/1000 collect_time, t22.project_no, to_char(t2.create_time,'yyyyMM') yearmonth, t22.company_id,t2.event_type description from em_nb_event t2,em_meter t22 where t2.event_type in ('power_cut','B1','B3','B5','B7','B9') and t2.e_num=t22.meter_no and t22.project_no is not null and t2.deal_flag=0 and (t2.create_time-(select max(t5.insert_time) from tb_meter_info_show t5 where t5.new_meter_number=t2.e_num))*24*60>50 order by t2.id desc
